/home/mehdi/ARMToolChain/gcc-arm-none-eabi-9-2019-q4-major-x86_64-linux/gcc-arm-none-eabi-9-2019-q4-major/bin/arm-none-eabi-g++    -mcpu=cortex-m4 -mthumb -mfpu=fpv4-sp-d16  --specs=nano.specs -T/home/mehdi/git_repo/Pre_Project/Hello_world/STM32F301C6Tx_FLASH.ld -Wl,-Map=/home/mehdi/git_repo/Pre_Project/Hello_world/build/first_hello_world.map,--cref -Wl,--gc-sections CMakeFiles/first_hello_world_STM32F301x6.elf.dir/helloWorld.cpp.obj  -o first_hello_world_STM32F301x6.elf  -lc -lm -lnosys
